showCommonAuditDetails

public void showCommonAuditDetails(oracle.adf.view.rich.event.QueryEvent queryEvent)
Method which gets called on click of Search in Common Audit Report query panel. This method has logic to read parameters from query panel, get table metadata, get report data & refresh table with report data.

Parameters:
QueryEvent - - queryEvent instance
